description:
He died in June 2009 but Michael Jackson's music is still having audiences everywhere on their feet.虽然迈克尔杰克逊2009年就去世了，但他的音乐仍然为观众所熟记。

And on Sunday night a hologram of the late King Of Pop rocked the Billboard Music Awards.在周日晚上的美国公告牌音乐颁奖典礼上，这个昔日流行天王的全息投影让现场为之震撼。

The hologram, which was amazingly realistic, performed Slave To The Rhythm and even moonwalked across the stage.全息投影在台上表演了《节奏奴隶》，并在舞台上表演太空步，效果十分逼真。

The hologram danced around the stage in a golden jacket and red trousers with fire shooting all around him, before appearing alongside several dancers, and began with Michael on a throne.舞台上，杰克逊身穿金色外套，红色裤子，与身后的宝座一起震撼登场。舞台四周喷出火焰，配合杰克逊的全场热舞。几位舞者稍后加入，为天王伴舞。

The onstage resurrection garnered a standing ovation by the massive star-studded audience, who were clearly moved by the performance nearly five years after his death - but it might not have happened.昔日天王在台上的“复活”获得了台下观众经久不歇的掌声，他们为时隔五年后看到的这场表演而感动——但这仅仅是个不实的幻影。

Only on Friday did a federal judge rule that the Billboard Music Awards could use the hologram, rejecting efforts from tech companies seeking to block the digital performance.然而某些科技公司却试图阻止这场全息表演。直到音乐节开始两天前的周五，联邦法院才宣布公告牌音乐颁奖典礼可以使用全息影像技术。
